Name: apricot-baboon-1270
Text: Just tried to cook dinner and somehow managed to set off the smoke alarm instead. Guess I’m a culinary genius in my own smoky way. Someone send help (and maybe takeout).

Comments.Name: classy-whippet-8471
Comments.Text: Maybe stick to simpler recipes until you get the hang of it—you’re not exactly impressing anyone with the smoke show.
